imgui.flag

Class ImGuiTabBarFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.flag.ImGuiTabBarFlags

  • public final class ImGuiTabBarFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    Flags for ImGui::BeginTabBar()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AutoSelectNewTabs
      Automatically select new tabs when they appear
      static int FittingPolicyDefault_ 
      static int FittingPolicyMask_ 
      static int FittingPolicyResizeDown
      Resize tabs when they don't fit
      static int FittingPolicyScroll
      Add scroll buttons when tabs don't fit
      static int NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton
      Disable behavior of closing tabs (that are submitted with p_open != NULL) with middle mouse button.
      static int None 
      static int NoTabListScrollingButtons
      Disable scrolling buttons (apply when fitting policy is ImGuiTabBarFlags_FittingPolicyScroll)
      static int NoTooltip
      Disable tooltips when hovering a tab
      static int Reorderable
      Allow manually dragging tabs to re-order them + New tabs are appended at the end of list
      static int TabListPopupButton
      Disable buttons to open the tab list popup

      • NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton

        public static final int NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton
        Disable behavior of closing tabs (that are submitted with p_open != NULL) with middle mouse button. You can still repro this behavior on user's side with if (IsItemHovered() && IsMouseClicked(2)) *p_open = false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
